directions: Stir water, sugar, tomato paste, basil, minced onion, oregano, granulated garlic, salt, cayenne pepper, and pork neck together in a large pot.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until thickened to desired consistency, about 30 minutes.
Remove pork neck bones to serve.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can tomato paste (such as Contadina®)
title: Awesome Sauce
